publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1981 Angus MacKay: Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill be passed. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
S1M-1981 Angus MacKay: Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill be passed. Supported by: Peter Peacock
